title: YouTube Disrupting Our Dunbar Numbers? Possibilities for Christian Community or Distortion?
summary: Google is making more money from subscriptions than from ads, with YouTube subscriptions generating $15 billion annually. YouTube premium offers an ad-free experience for viewers, but Google is aggressively fighting ad blockers. With shifts in the media landscape, YouTube is becoming a key platform for content delivery. As the world changes, churches and institutions are also facing transformations as caring remains a constant amidst these changes. These trends in subscription revenue and online content consumption highlight the evolving nature of the digital age.
